heading: How equal are women and men in the EU?
subheading: In 2023, the 1.6-point increase in the EU's overall score is the biggest year-on-year increase since the first edition of the index in 2013 (when it stood at 63.1).
textNote: The data for 2023 Index is mostly from 2021 and 2022.The Gender Equality Index gives the EU and the Member States a score from 1 to 100. A score of 100 would mean that a country had reached full equality between women and men.
